name: Q: Cue
summary: 1895. Main character is a representative of Meiji government sent on culture inspection to the United States. Upon his arrival inexplicable series of mystery murders start to occur.

name: Q-Cubed
summary: Q-Cubed is a spatial-reasoning puzzle platformer. Navigate a 3D world while seeing and moving in two orthogonal perspectives.

name: QChat
summary: Welcome to the mainland of Zelasda, where you can play the role of a survivor or use various props to evade the pursuit of regulators, crack the cipher machine, and escape from the manor to win!!!
